values: well guys, this is my last journal entry because frankly, i really dont enjoy having a journal anymore. but, for my last entry, its a good one. i think i had the best friday/saturday weekend ever this year or maybe more. first me, alex, and elaine went to the sox game on friday and got a little lost in the ghetto. damn we always get lost in the worst neighborhoods. well we finaly got there and it was a blast. then after that, me and alex went over to my love kristas apartment. (yes, i did call her right after my last entry and we talked for an hour, i love that girl). me her and alex had the best time ever. i cant tell you enough how much i love her. she seriously is my sister. well the city was "fabulous" as always, and in the morning (this morning) elaine came back up to the city with matt anhd we went to this chicago aids walk. it was so cool. it was 5 miles along the lakeshore, and it was so fun and we actually felt like we did something for a good cause afterwords. im definatly doiing it again next year. well, thats about it for now. its been a trip. good fucking bye.

im like really depressed for some reason. i miss krista soooo much. im gonna cry if i cant see her soon. i havent seen in forever. alex got to see her last weekend and im really happy that one of finally got in touch with her, but now i miss her even more. sorry. everyone reading this is probably like get the fuck over it nick, but they just dont understand. i miss oklahoma too. i was listening to the music off that soundtrack and i miss it so much. i miss everything about it, like the whole experience itself, the people in it, the music, just everything. everytime something reminds me of it, i get all sad. and im sure krista has a big part on why i miss it. thats it. im gonna go call her.

shoot me in the fucking face cause i never update. *sigh* you can also shoot me because i went to the marian football game last nite. eh. i dont know i guess it was fun because i finally saw ted and got to hang out with lauren a little bit. then i found out after alex went to the steriophonex show, they went and visited krista. *tear*. i miss her so much. but me and alex are going to go down there one day and watch chicago and make a day out of it. marvalous. well im going to go and ill try to update this more. if i dont, i owe you a cookie. good fucking bye.
I LOVE LAUREN!!! AND SHE LOVES ME!!! AND WERE GOING TO HOMECOMING TOGETHER!!! W00T W00T! (haha are you happy lauren??)

ok i really really suck at updating. this is like the 5th time i havent updated in like 5 or 6 days. well anywho, i finished my first full week of school on friday, its going ok but im still making the transition between the summer and the school year. on friday, instead of going to the first football game, me alex amanda and scot went to the muse and saw pedestrian, vince h and brian's band. it was pretty fun. me and alex went to bakers square first and had a delicious cheese burger. mmmmm. then we headed up to lansing for the show and scot had to pee so we rolled up in this ghetto and alex pulled up in front of this house. well, this guy came out and at first i didnt know who it was so i was staring at him and he was staring at me. he started yellin and shit like he was gonna shoot us or something, so scot jumped in and we booked outta there. we got lost. oh yes. when we finally found our way out, we noticed we were in Ford Heights, the infamous ghetto of the south suburbs. well we got to the show, it was grand, and then i stayed out in lansing with some friends after the show and just crashed at their house. well we stayed up til like 4 and i think i have a cold cause im really stuffed up. well im gonna ge off cause i gotta call ted, were having a poker nite when he gets back. later.

oh man what a night. my cousin called me and was like do you have plans tonite? and i was like no (even though i was supposed to go to hooters with ted) and she was like do you wanna go to the sox game? and i was like fo shiz! so i went to the sox game and we had freaking box seats! it was tizight, we won 13-2. yea im supertired now. yesterday i went over to amanda's house and me and her watched bowling for columbine, im gonna go buy that. it was awesome, i loved it. well im purrty tired so im gonna head to bed. good nite.

ahhhhh yes, the first day of my sophomore year at marian catholic high school. but first lets recap nick's eventful fun week! haha well ill just tell the cool parts. hmmmm i think it was....tuesday, genna and kat were going to starbucks so i went over there and we hung out with our frappachino's haha. it was actually really fun. i love those two girls. the next night the hensleys came over and i decided to go hang out there. we rented this movie House of 1000 Corpses, and omg, that movie is awesome! it was pretty scary, but not in a "shit ur pants scary" but more like a "jaw-dropping, omg thats freaky". yea im gonna go buy the dvd. i suggest it to everyone but not with a parental type person, my parents would fareak if they saw that, haha. yea then the next day, we went out paintballing. see they and there friends are all like hardcore paintballers like they have a team and i didnt wanna get my ass kicked by them cause they would bunker me and i would die, plus the lack of equiptment for me to play, so i just filmed it with matts' tight video camera. yea then later that night we went out on rob's new 4 wheeler. it was really fun. that brings me to today, the first day of school. it was....actually better than i expected. i expected shitty classes with shitty teachers and no friends in my class, but it was the opposite of what i thought, with the exception of some teachers. plus, it was so fareaking hot in that building! i was about to pass out, my hair was like a fro by the end of the day haha. yea i already got homework though and i gotta read ellen foster, gosh that book sucks. ok im out. later

ok lets back tract to the choir lock-in. it actually wasnt as bad as i thought it would be. me alex and genna hung out the whole time it was pretty cool. yea and then after the choir lock-in it was a tuesday. dashboard's new c.d. came out! ahhhh! (im a loser haha). but yea i had to go get it. and i did. and it's amazing! im such a closet emo kid. w00t. yea its so great im still yet to find a song of theirs i dont like. it puts me in a good mood everytime i listen to it! and then yesterday we took my brother josh to college at ISU. the night before j-dubs had a little party outside in the back. it was really fun. it was cool i guess, except he's got a weird roomate. i hope that works out for him. hmmmmmmm...today i have a orthodontist *satan* appointment today. thats gonna suck. oh well, then im goign out with ross and some people cause they go back to school on monday, mwa ha ha!! yea well im gonna go eat some lunch. later days

hey guys and gurls. im really slacking, i always dontupdate for like a week, it's getting bad. but im here now and ill xplain my hardcore weekend. haha yea rite, it sucked hardcore is what i meant. i went up to my grandpa's in wisconsin for the weekend whicc wasnt all that bad but the whole trip just sucked. josh couldnt come up till saturday nite so i was by myself bored of my ass. i did golf though on saturday afternoon, and came back yesterday (sunday). but before we came back we went to this church picnic. *sigh* yea. that was bad enough. but to go along with those tasty wisconsin cheese curds (sarcasm) was the worst polka band on the face of the earth. it was absolutly horrible. i was on the brink of tears i wanted to go home so bad. well i did, went to bed and find myself here now. i have my choir lock-in tonite. i dont know what to xspect. it prolly will be awful. well i dont know what im doing up to then but uh, im out. good fucking bye.

hey guys. *sigh* boy am i tired. so me and my friends went up to chicago yesterday. it was pretty great. first we went out to eat at this little small independent type resteraunt called Hank's Franks. i had the best cheeseburger in my life there. i cannot think of a word to descibe its goodness so ill make one up, right now; scrumptralescent. well then we went on to virgin mega store, the biggest music store in chicago and in illinois, i think. i got a red hot valentines c.d. it's awesome. then we went to north beach on north avenue. for those of you who know chicago from randolph (that's were we got off the train) to north avenue beach is a long hike. yea we didnt think that we would swim but we did anyways. it was freezing! and the ways were like massive! like 2 feet over our heads    it was fun. yea so im really tired from yesterday.ok im out for now. good fucking bye.

*sigh* man im tired and sore (and no i wasnt havin sex). i just got back from t-money's lake house. twas pretty tight. we went sailing, tubing, all that lake house type bizzness. i took a nasty spill on the tube, i went outside the wake and it wasnt pretty. yea well im going to chicago tomorrow with like 20 people, it'll be fun. i cant sleep, yet im not quite awake. i think im gonna try to go to sleep though. good fucking bye

i couple days ago i went to discount records and got tres c.d.'s : matt skiba/kevin seconds split c.d., lawrence arms - apathy and exaustion, and then alkaline trio - maybe ill catch fire, i had to replace my old one that i lost a long long time ago so its pretty much brand new. garsh i heart them so much. anywho yesterday i had like 5 people over and we hung out in the basement and one of the girls purses got snatched, which ended in a hadcore game of keep away in my front lawn at 11:00. goood times. today, krista called me at like 11:30 in the morning and woke me up, and said "get up, get dressed, we doing lunch" apparently shes back in town for some concert tonite so yea me her and alex went out to bakers square the best resteraunt in the world. i heart bakers square too. thats out spot. they know us by name there, we always talk to the waitress' all the time so theyre cool to us. we go there all the time. then we went to alexs house and hung out there. me and alex were gonna go to the mall but we didnt know how to get there. oh well, i dunno what im doing tomorrow. homewood days is this weekend. ill prolly kick it there before i got to camp. 3 more days! oke doke. im out.

wooooooooo! my brother's party was not bad, yet intensely yummy. so much food! some of my friends came to keep me company but my two couisins (who are imfamous for following me around all the time and fuckin   up my ass all day...ok that didnt sound right, haha, whateva, i do what i want!)........damn i lost my train of thought. that was a big ass parentesees (wow i just murdered that word). oh yea, my two cousins were like my little wilson family posse following me around. now your prolly sayin "nick, when people follow you around thats supposed to make you cool!" *sighs* no. it took 3 points off my coolness chart which leaves me at like negative 64. Sing It Again, Rookie Beeyatch! hahahahaha i love that but it came out of nowhere (it's off of super troopers) im such a hyper loser tonite. Whateva, I do What I Want!!! thank goodness for eric cartman. yeeeaaaaaaa. sorry this is prolly not funny to neone, but im makin myself giggle like a little girl!. ill prolly apologize tomorrow for this entry. later

me, ted, and ross have been rained out of golfing for the elevendy-billionth time! damn you rain, damn you! that felt good. no it didn't. i ordered a couple of shirts and posters tonite. i got an anti-flag and nofx poster and a alkaline trio shirt and a "not my president" shirt. twas good times. tomorrow im either going to the mall or golfing. i need to get some stickers for my guitar at the topic store. i havent had starbucks for like a week. im gonna die. im a recovering frap-aholic. i couldnt take it and had one last week in chicago, and now im hooked again. my brothers graduation party is this sunday. shoot me in the foot. that's going to be negative fun. my little cousins are gonna be following me around; ill have to dodge them. i wanna hang out with sagan this weekend. maybe i can hang out with her during my bro's party. that's like a double +plus+! haha yea my brother's being a bechacha, he wants to get on. im outty. good fucking bye.

i miss sagan *tear* its only been a week though. im pathetic. but what makes me happy is that im gonna be at camp in 9 days. *quivers in excitment*. oh and conan o'brien was just on and it was the funniest one ever. that made me happy too. yea thats pretty much all for now haha. boring entry.

yesterday i went to rob's house and we went swimming at the jenson's big ass pool. even though i dont swim, twas good times. we hung out and then played king of the raft and beeat the hell out of each other with those noodle things. haha. yeeeaaa. then me and ted and ross and jeff went and saw 28 days later tonite. it was........not what i expected. not as scurry as i thought. id give it 1 and a half stars. yeeaaaa im at  t-moneys right now so im gonna go. outty.

*sighs* today was........meh. i went to some family 4th of july party which really wasnt that bad. but i got really sick of this "god bless america" b.s. really quick. oh well. and the sox lost too. i fucking hate billy koch. i have a mad headache. ok conan's on, good fucking bye

i went to the taste today and it mos def lived up to its name. the taste of chicago was fer damn sure tasty.  lets have fun with this.........

1. favorite food? - mos def, the boneless rib sandwich
2. worst food? - the ice cream didnt meet my expectations
3. favorite person of the day? - sagan, my love
4. most boring moment - definatly the ferris wheel haha, bad idea
5. best moment - finally finding sagan!
6. worst moment - the aftermath of the rib sandwich (hahaha ross)
7. why the hell am i doing this? - i really dont know, im quite bored
8. what's the reason for more questions? - i wanna get to 10 dammit!
9. who saw the sox game last nite? - i sure as hell did! whooo!!!
10. ok im done now    it wasnt worth it

                     good fucking bye

guess what? ted's sister had her baby! her name's gabrielle lynn (damn i hate spelling) its so weird cause i justfound out today wheni came over, ted's like "hey nick, meet my neice". im like wtf? it's weird because although i hate children, this will be acceptional because it's like my best friends niece, and she's living there. tight buisness. yea and eveything sucked up to then cause everyone couldnt go to the taste on saturday but we all can most likely go on thursday. rock. and i might be able to see sagan and hang out with her. rock x 4. guess what people? im gonna cut my hair. go see charlie's angels 2 haha and the buff irish guy has the dew i want. omg omg omg did i just say "dew"? *shoots self in foot* ok i just grossed myself out. im going to go now. good fucking bye (rock to matt skiba)

man, this song is stuck in my head, that "are you happy now?" song by michelle branch. it's great, i really dont care if it's stuck in my head. it reminds me of me, alex and krista at her apartment. you see, when we were there, we were playin that song alot becuse its so tight. well, krista brought us up to her sunroof on the top of the building, outside. we got up to the railing and looked out into the city, and with that song playin and the wind blowin in your face, it so felt like we were in a music video or something haha. for real though, it was the coolest feeling ever. i love the city so much. im gonna live there sometime (i know i say that all the time but its gonna happen). im going down there on saturday with a bunch of people for the taste. its gonna rock my socks off. 2 more days and a final left in the summer school life. urgh! i cant wait till im free again! im prolly gonna start drivers ed and get a job. w00t, rock, owwwww, mercy! sooooooo bored.....ok, time to read. im out for now.

hey guess what? everythings ok now. yea my parents were like whatever and now my dads making fun of me and my friends cause we got lost. figures. anywho they were going out to the brewarlast nite for dinner and asked if i wanna come so i did. then halfway there i realized alex was working there and i was shit my parents better not say anything about last nite. yea, they did. we were all jokin though. it was fun. alex busses there and i think im gonna try to get a job there when i get off summer school. boo to school. im in a wedding tomorrow. im an usher and im wearing a tux. i look damn good. ok im gonna go. bye bye now

whoa......last nite was crazy. so me and alex went with krista up to her new apartment in chicago yesterday. we missed the 4:52 train so we took the 5:45. urgh! oh well we got there and had to walk awhile cause that one station thing burned down. oh my god. krista's place is amazing! its on michigan ave. and it is so awesome. the view is so great and the sundeck on top off the building.....just unbelievable. i love chicago. im so gonna live there someday. no lie. so here was the conflict: my parents wanted me to take the 8:45 so id be back at 9:30 (for some reason) but that was too early i wanted to take the 9:35. so my dad wouldnt let me but my mom said ok. we went to starbucks (she has one rite across the street! damn you krista!) we walked around and went back to her place. we hung out, played guitar, listened to music and all that shit. then we had to catch the train. krista said she was gonna come back with us and go to some party at her house, and she   had   to put her make-up on! we had 10 min to catch the train. if we missed it, i was dead. i was already gettin home at 10:45. oh yea, i needed to get home so early because i had summer school next morning. (there now it all makes sense to you guys haha). we ran out the apartment and flagged a cab down. we were cursing at this chinease guy to go faster   it was so fun haha. anyways we made it just in time. and got back right on time. (did i mention i was studying for a test on the train? haha) ok here comes the fun part. i had 10 min to get home and we were in oak forest. about 25 min. later we found out we took a wrong turn and have been going the wrong way the whole time. we were all the way in the back of orland for all of you who live around here. yea, thats hella far. i called my mom and she was pissed. i got home at like 11:45. urgh! when i walked in i didnt say a fucking word. my mom was like go right to bed and i just walked upstairs. today she didnt seem mad until i asked her about it. she was blaming it on me like it was my fault. now, i didnt want to point fingers but krista told me over and over it was her fault but ya know it was an accident im not mad at them at all or blaming anyone. accidents happen. all i can say is "im sorry" to my parents and if they want to be unfair and come up with some bullshit excuse to punish me....well than fuck it. ill take it. my moms being all "anti-nick" and not even talkin to me at all today. and she said my dads gonna prolly talk to me too. that will be tons o' fun. this is all blown way out of proportion. i dunno. things are just messed up right now and im confused because i had such a great time.....but then that happened. ok thats way too much typing but thats pretty much it. ill update this when things are back to normal. im out

whoa. im really sorry about that last entry. i dont know where that came from. it all bottled up and i had to write it off my chest. yea well im in a much better mood now. im going to teds lake house tonite. rock. this weekend's gonna be totally chill. yea but i gotta type a paper before i go so im out.

i used to have a crush on you, and i kept telling myself i didnt anymore. but then i heard your voice...and that old feeling came back. i keep telling myself i cant have you...but i cant stop thinking about you. i keep saying "nick, it would never work out"...and it hurts me everytime i think about it. i love your smile, your personality, your sense of humor, just you in general. i find myself falling for you more and more everytime i talk to you. im going to ted's lake house this weekend and he's assured me that ill meet a couple girls up there. maybe that'll get my mind off of you. i really want to get over you...but i cant. dammit, teenage romance is a bitch. i hate it. i just want that feeling like somebody cares for me in a way that i care for them. ive never met anyone like you.....and it kills me. dont get me wrong. theres a part of me that wants you to know how i feel. but im still not sure. i hope when you read this you know who you are.
gosh darnit im bored and we have nuthin to do. me and lazy summer days have a love / hate relationship.

hey hey. whats crackalackin? nuthin much hurre. i had experimentals on friday and camp training this weekend in chicago. experimentals were awesome. i was told i did really really good (and not just by my parents haha) so that was fun. training was semi-boring, semi-fun. i saw all my friends so that was cool. lots of fun stories from our fun time with polariod pictures to bekki calling me and aaron "shady characters," haha. but in a way im still upset by that. it was fun but by the end everyone ended up getting mad at me and aaron for stupid reasons (except that one where we were an hour late to breakfast, whoops) yea so i got back today and went up to my moms school with her and talked with momma. krista moved in to her apartment on friday and me and alex are going up to baker's square with her tomorrow (that's the chill-axing tight buisness eating spot for us three owww!) im planning on sleeping in for a mighty long time tomorrow itll be my first of the summer. then going out to eat with alex and krista and then im getting my guitar! woot! (haha aaron) man although i may seem in a good perky jumpy mood i got really quite mad and depressed about an hour ago. i was on anti-flag.com and read something about some anti-gay church that has a website called godhatesfags.com and so much shit ran through my head and honestly i almost started crying. just like, the ignorance and hatred somebody can have against somebody else, for example gays, is unbelievable and the fact that they bring the church and organized religion into the picture and that this man (the reverend) is a respected man in the community is disgusting. kids are being brought up on hatred and are being tought to hate homosexuals. i think thats bullshit and for me, it's hitting uncomfortably close to home. im sorry i just needed to say that. thanx for listening to my bitchy rant. im listening to the smiths and thats making me more depressed now so im gonna go bed. goodnite
